scripts.dist: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && zip -j dist/dashbuilder_dist.zip ./dashbuilder-authoring/target/dashbuilder-authoring.war ./dashbuilder-authoring/target/dashbuilder-authoring-bootable.jar ./dashbuilder-runtime-parent/dashbuilder-runtime-app/target/dashbuilder-runtime-app-runner.jar
scripts.build:prod:linux: yarn lint && yarn install:mvnw && mvn clean install -Dfull -B -ntp -DskipTests=$(build-env global.build.test --not) && yarn dist
